trans-unit.source: The base class for the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> and <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricProofDescriptor" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricProofDescriptor" /> 類別的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ProofDescriptor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別中的建構函式呼叫，以將 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ProofDescriptor" /> 類別初始化。

trans-unit.source: The RSTR object to be modified by this proof descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 這個證明描述元要修改的 RSTR 物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the appropriate properties inside the RSTR according to the properties of the current proof descriptor instance.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前的證明描述元執行個體在 RSTR 內設定適當的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the key identifier that can be used inside issued tokens to define the key.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，取得金鑰識別項，其可在發行的權杖內用來定義金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The key can be either symmetric or asymmetric.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵可以是對稱或非對稱。

trans-unit.source: If the key is symmetric, the identifier is usually the binary secret or encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰是對稱，識別碼通常是二進位密碼或加密的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: If the key is asymmetric, the identifier is usually the key identifier from the `<wst:UseKey>` element inside of a `wst:RequestSecurityToken` message (RST); the public key.
trans-unit.target: 如果非對稱金鑰，識別碼通常是從金鑰識別碼`<wst:UseKey>`項目內`wst:RequestSecurityToken`訊息 (RST)，則為公開金鑰。
